newsitem.title: SOUTH AFRICA: Mast H1 shr up 50 pct on previous 13 months.
newsitem.headline: Mast H1 shr up 50 pct on previous 13 months.

text.p: Half year ended February 28 versus 13 months to August 31

NOTE - The company said that a direct comparison between the two reporting periods was difficult due to the cyclical nature of some of the divisions and the inclusion of AdvTech subsidiaries with effect from March 1.

It said an expansion programme had commenced. A new division had been created offering training programmes and consulting services covering high level management issues. Mast Training Consultants would be incorporated into this divison.
Mast said that in view of the recent turnaround achieved, a conservative dividend policy has been adopted for this year to build up reserves.
